Class FXUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods for Java FX.

      • attachToAnchorPane

        public static void attachToAnchorPane(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane parent,
                                      javafx.scene.Node child,
                                      double anchor,
                                      boolean removeAttachedNodes)
        Attaches a node to an anchor pane using the given anchor value for all the directions.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent anchor pane
        anchor - the anchor value to use for all the directions
        removeAttachedNodes - whether remove the already attached nodes from the anchor pane before attach the new child
        See Also:
        attachToAnchorPane(AnchorPane, Node, double, double, double, double, boolean)

      • attachToAnchorPane

        public static void attachToAnchorPane(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane parent,
                                      javafx.scene.Node child,
                                      double l,
                                      double t,
                                      double r,
                                      double b,
                                      boolean removeAttachedNodes)
        Attaches a node to an anchor pane using the given anchor values.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent anchor pane
        child - the child node
        l - the left anchor value
        t - the top anchor value
        r - the right anchor value
        b - the bottom anchor value
        removeAttachedNodes - whether remove the already attached nodes from the anchor pane before attach the new child
